name: Where's the Cake? (danceswithpixels)
description:
Find the cake with the correctly colored layers in this fast-paced and lighthearted local multiplayer game!

Controls:

Player 1:
Move: WASD
Choose: SPACE

Player 2:
Move: ARROW KEYS
Choose: ENTER

Music from: https://www.bensound.com/
Sounds from: https://freesound.org/
